title: Paragon Backup & Recovery 14 Home 10.1.21.287 (preactivated)
description:
Paragon Backup & Recovery 14 Home 10.1.21.287 (preactivated) RePack by D!akov

Powerful Backup. Ultimate Recovery. Full range of backup and recovery solutions. Your system and valuable data are protected and can be restored in case of any disaster! Back up files and folders, operating system or even your entire hard disk to any storage you choose. Enhanced Backup Format. Windows 8.1 Support.

The most reliable recovery solution
- Four dependable recovery environments boot your PC even after a severe crash.
- Restore any supported Windows operating system and its applications without re-installation.
- Restore your system to completely different hardware and boot it immediately.
- Get single files from your backup archives easily if accidentally deleted.

Fast and flexible backup technologies
- Backup complete hard drives, single partitions or selected files and folders.
- Never forget important steps: Paragon Smart Backup Wizard leads you through the setup.
- Safeguard your system while it is up and running.
- All popular backup techniques: sector and file-level increments, sector differentials, file complements, synthetic and cyclic backup.
- Automate backup routines by scheduling operations with wizards.
- Store your backups on external hard drives, on Blu-ray discs, or on your networkÃ¢â‚¬Â¦whatever works best for you!

The all-inclusive solution for data security
- Includes Adaptive Restore 3.0 to easily recover your system on different hardware.
- WinPE recovery environment* is highly compartible with your hardware.
- Includes GPT partition scheme support.
- Automatic partition alignment during restore on the latest hard drives.

Supported Operating Systems
- (New!) Windows 8.1 (32/64-bit)
- Windows 8 (32/64-bit)
- Windows 7 (32/64-bit)
- Windows Vista (32/64-bit)
- Windows XP Professional (32/64-bit)
- Windows XP Home
- Windows 2000 SP4

INSTALLATION
1) DOWNLOAD THE TORRENT
2) INSTALL
3) ENJOY
